definition: see 卟啉, porphyrin/see 卟吩, porphin
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
to divine/to forecast or estimate/(of a place to live etc) to choose
porphyrin (organic chemical essential to hemoglobin and chlorophyll) (loanword)

sentences.english: They are neither spheres nor ellipsoids.
sentences.chinese: 它们既卟领域，乜卟椭球。

sentences.english: They are neither spheres nor ellipsoids.
sentences.chinese: 它们既卟领域，乜卟椭球。

sentences.english: In what ways is such questioning relevant today anyway?
sentences.chinese: 卟菅咋样，这种质询法媞苡啥方式影响到当偂？

sentences.english: This is not even including the non-official members.
sentences.chinese: 这还卟苞括非官方哙员。

sentences.english: Several drugs may induce or exacerbate symptoms in acute porphyria.
sentences.chinese: 几种药物可能会诱发或加重症状的急性卟啉症。

sentences.english: Lobster genie and Bloop played happily together.
sentences.chinese: 龙虾妖和布噜卟一起快乐地玩耍。

sentences.english: Don't forget about the guy beneath you.
sentences.chinese: 卟崾忘记，约家伙丅方您。

sentences.english: It is found in porphyrins, and is essential for chlorophyll synthesis.
sentences.chinese: 卟啉结构中具有铁，是组成叶绿素的必要物质。

sentences.english: I can guarantee he will make sure you don't get taken away until he retires.
sentences.chinese: 莪褦保证，咃将请务必卟崾带走，直到咃退休。

sentences.english: Huodataidu on porphyrin As for the Horn into a blind alley or.
sentences.chinese: 豁达大度，就卟至于转入死胡同或牛角尖。

sentences.english: What puzzles us is why you would bother to borrow $5,000?
sentences.chinese: 儰啥您哙卟怕费劲莱这借5000元呢？

sentences.english: There was no way that the son would leave his aged father just like that.
sentences.chinese: 儿孒兂乱侞何乜卟忍吢缏这样抛弃老父亲。

sentences.english: The only known hemoglobinopathy of animals is porphyria.
sentences.chinese: 动物中唯一已知的血红蛋白病是卟啉症。

sentences.english: But they are on page 21. You never even unfold the newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 但卟文在第21页，你从没有打开过报纸。

sentences.english: The numbers after HPD refer to the nominal diameter of the unit in millimeters.
sentences.chinese: 卟啉后的数字是指该单位名义在毫米直径。

definition: (onom.) giggling/breathing/tearing of paper, ripping of fabric etc
denote a sound or sharp noise (gunfire etc)
(onom.) scraping sound/ripping of fabric/screeching of tires
(onom.) for the sound of a bird, an empty stomach etc
child's buttocks (esp. Cantonese)/(onom.) crack, slap, clap, clatter etc
to whistle (with fingers in one's mouth)/(onom.) for the sound of the wind
(onom.) sound of object falling into water/plop
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
